title: Duran Duran -  All You Need Is Now (resequenced and expanded by
description:
Duran Duran
All You Need is Now
resequenced and expanded by }{eywood

All You Need is Now is arguably the best album DD have ever done.  It was also a prolific album with a lot of left over material later released on B-sides.  For this release I've reordered the album a bit, and sequenced these B-sides into the album where I felt they fit the best.  It's a full CD worth of music now, and I think it's an even better album than what they released originally

01 Return to Now
02 All You Need is Now
03 Blame The Machines
04 Being Followed
05 Leave a Light On
06 Safe (in the Heat of the Moment)
07 Girl Panic!
08 The Man Who Stole a Leopard
09 Networker Nation
10 To Close to the Sun
11 Too Bad You're So Beautiful
12 Early Summer Nerves
13 Other People's Lives
14 Mediterranea
15 Runway Runaway
16 This Lost Weekend
17 Before the Rain
18 A Diamond in the Mind

Bonus:
19 All You Need is Now (Youth Kills mix)
